attributes.action: Remove the place of birth from the British Passports to safeguard British Citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the fact that we are British Citizens we are constantly being harassed, discriminated against and judged by our country of birth &  more often disregarded and mistreated as British citizens. This is violation of our basic human rights and its time that the Prime Minister takes action to safeguard the interest of British citizens overseas.
